name: Odbic
description:
Odbic (Polish for "bounce") is an HTML5 puzzler inspired by early 2000s Flash games where you need to guide a ball to a goal by using "bouncers". By moving and rotating different bouncers you need to get the ball to the goal without running into any obstacles in over 50 hand-made levels. Easy to learn, hard to master!

Note: HTML5 version of the game does not support controllers
